name: spo-get-message-centre-announcements-and-post-to-teams-channel
title: This script allows you to retrieve Message Centre announcements and post to teams
shortDescription: This script allows you to retrieve Message Centre announcements and post to teams.
longDescription: This script allows you to connect to your SharePoint Online tenant and retrieve Message Centre announcements.
It then connects to Microsoft Teams and loops through the announcements, posting them to a specific Teams channel.

thumbnails.alt: This sample does not contain a preview image

references.name: Want to learn more about the Microsoft Graph
references.description: Check out the documentation site to get started and for the reference to the endpoints.
